#summary v8cgi User manual

= User manual =

v8cgi is an embedding of [http://code.google.com/p/v8/ V8], a !JavaScript interpreter from Google. v8cgi can be used in many ways; either as a CLI (Command-line Interface) program for executing (shell-)scripts, or as an Apache module / CGI binary for creating and serving web pages.

v8cgi ships with various libraries (modules), which provide additional functionality. v8cgi runs on Posix-compliant systems and Microsoft Windows.

= First steps =

In order to use v8cgi, you first have to get the binary. Windows users can just download a [http://code.google.com/p/v8cgi/downloads/list precompiled release], otherwise one has to compile v8cgi from source. There is a separated wikipage dedicated to [Compiling Compiling v8cgi].
